CONVERSATION NOTE: No, it’s intentional.  The merchantdrop version sets different quest flags but is otherwise the same convo.  The reason for this is because the boxes can be activated in any order, but the merchant’s box triggers a conversation with the merchant afterward.  Since I can’t rely on a quest flag to determine whether or not this conversation is the first/second/third and the merchant one due to the random nature of their spawn, I had to dupe this convo and add it specifically to the merchant’s box.
